thread.title: BRIEF-SSLJ.com Enters Into Agreement With Hubei Rural Credit Cooperatives To Establish Financing Platform

title: BRIEF-SSLJ.com Enters Into Agreement With Hubei Rural Credit Cooperatives To Establish Financing Platform

organizations.name: hubei rural credit cooperatives to establish financing platform
rural credit cooperatives to establish financing platform reuters staff

text:
21 PM / Updated 11 minutes ago BRIEF-SSLJ.com Enters Into Agreement With Hubei Rural Credit Cooperatives To Establish Financing Platform Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
Feb 12 (Reuters) - SSLJ.com Ltd: 
* SSLJ.COM LIMITED ENTERS INTO STRATEGIC COOPERATION FRAMEWORK AGREEMENT WITH HUBEI RURAL CREDIT COOPERATIVES TO ESTABLISH A FINANCING PLATFORM 
* SSLJ.COM LTD - ‚ÄçHBRCC TO ASSIST SSLJ BY PROVIDING FINANCIAL SERVICES INCLUDING CREDIT FINANCING, SETTLEMENT, CASH MANAGEMENT, CONSULTING, AMONG OTHERS Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
